text:
HyperScience | New York, NY | Onsite | Full Time | https://hyperscience.com/ We’re looking for:

-DevOps Engineers

-Frontend Engineers

-Sales Engineers

-IT Managers

-Product Designers

At HyperScience, we help organizations better serve their clients by automating data entry. It’s a deceptively complex use case with large implications. Slow or inaccurate data entry can lead to poor customer experiences or even affect the delivery of important government services. Our machine learning-driven software is proven to minimize errors while maximizing speed - all while ensuring security and keeping a focus on the end user experience.

We offer competitive salaries and great benefits (401k matching, parental leave, generous vacation allotment & more)

Apply here https://hyperscience.com/careers and mention HN or feel free to email me with any questions: dave[at]hyperscience.com
